ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: The people with taqwa will be among Gardens and Fountains,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Surely those who fear God and follow the straight path will be amidst gardens and fresh springs of water,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: As for the God-fearing, they shall be in the midst of gardens and fountains,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The pious ones will live amidst gardens and springs,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed the pious are among Gardens and water springs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, those who have Taqwa will be in the midst of Gardens and Springs,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely those who guard (against evil) shall be in gardens and fountains.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely the godfearing shall be among gardens and fountains
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! those who keep from evil will dwell amid gardens and watersprings,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Surely the God-fearing will find themselves in the midst of gardens and springs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily the God-fearing will be amid Gardens and water- springs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed the Godwary will be amid gardens and springs,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: As to the Righteous, they will be in the midst of Gardens and Springs,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, the Muttaqun (pious - see V. 2:2) will be in the midst of Gardens and Springs (in the Paradise),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: The righteous shall live among gardens and fountains,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But the pious are amidst gardens and springs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, the righteous will be among gardens and springs,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [51:15]   Truly the God-fearing will be amid gardens, orchards, and springs, flowing therein,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Then Allah explained the abode of the believers, like Abu Bakr and his fellow believers, saying: (Lo! those who keep from evil) those who ward off disbelief, idolatry and indecencies (will dwell amid Gardens and watersprings) of pure water.
